Module COMP2042.CW.hfyxc3
Package brickdestroyer.model.game

Class ScoreBoardModel

java.lang.Object
brickdestroyer.model.game.ScoreBoardModel
public class ScoreBoardModel extends Object
Score Board Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the score board.
